function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deployment of digital technologies may lead to privacy and data security risks in handling personal health information.","Impact":"Increased risk of unauthorized access, data breaches, and misuse of sensitive health data.","Mitigation":"Implementation of stringent data protection policies, encryption, and access controls.","Technologies":"Encryption, access control technologies, secure data storage solutions.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and individuals providing personal health information.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers, and regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Reliance on digital platforms may lead to issues of digital divide, limiting access to healthcare assistance for certain populations.","Impact":"Unequal access to healthcare, limited participation in digital health initiatives, and exacerbation of health disparities.","Mitigation":"Investment in digital literacy programs, infrastructure development in underserved areas, and targeted outreach to at-risk populations.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health applications, and community health information systems.","People":"Underserved populations, individuals with limited access to digital resources.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and community health organizations."},{"Description":"Interoperability challenges may arise when integrating multiple digital technologies used for COVID-19 mitigation, leading to data silos and reduced efficiency.","Impact":"Inefficient data sharing, duplication of efforts, and fragmented healthcare delivery.","Mitigation":"Adoption of healthcare interoperability standards, integration of APIs, and development of data exchange platforms.","Technologies":"Healthcare interoperability standards, API integration solutions, and data exchange platforms.","People":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies, and research institutions.","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, technology providers, and healthcare organizations."}]}
